headline: Hispanic Center of Western Michigan Receives $50,000 in Grants from Comcast to Support Digital Literacy, Job Readiness Training
summary: Comcast today announced it has awarded $50,000 in grants to the Hispanic Center of Western Michigan, a Grand Rapids-based community organization dedicated to serving the needs of the Latino and broader community through family support, workforce development, and youth education programs.

headline: Universal Ads Study Reveals Combination of Streaming TV and Social Media Ads Supercharges Growth for Emerging Brands
summary: PHILADELPHIA, November 18, 2025--A Universal Ads study reveals that a combination of streaming TV and social media ads supercharges growth for emerging brands.

headline: Does Comcast’s Stock Slide Signal a Value Opportunity After Recent Industry Mergers?
summary: Thinking of buying Comcast and wondering if now is the time for real value, or if the market’s just playing tricks? Let’s dig in together and see what the numbers actually say. Comcast’s stock price has been on something of a rollercoaster lately, with a 0.4% bump over the last week, but still down 27.3% year-to-date and 34.3% over the past year. Much of this downside has come as the media and telecom industries have faced headwinds from shifting consumer habits, streaming wars, and...

headline: Netflix is finally leaning into a key piece of the media playbook: Merchandising
summary: Netflix finally has a robust line-up of original intellectual property and is bolstering its merchandising strategy to keep fans engaged between releases.
